programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Tutkijaryhma etsii vastauksia Mothmania eli koimiesta ymparoiviin mysteereihin. He tutkivat teorioita, joiden mukaan tama legendaarinen elainhahmo on poikkeus evoluutioketjussa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Nelivuotias maltanterrieri Therodore saapuu sairaalaan mystisten oireiden takia. Koiran tilan heiketessa laakarit tuskailevat diagnoosin kanssa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Puumajarakentamisen erikoisosaaja Pete Nelson kay lapi kaudella aikaisemmin nayttamatonta kuvamateriaalia, muistelee hurjia tilanteita ja epaortodoksisia rakennustekniikoita.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Ross ostaa liikkuvan yksikon kauempana tehtavaa tyota varten. Klinikalla han tutkii iguanan paisetta, ja halvaantunut mayrakoira saa uudet pyorat alleen.

programme.title: Take Back the Harbour
programme.desc: Osterit palaavat New Yorkin Governor-saarelle uraauurtava suojeluohjelman ansiosta. Niista on hyotya koko satama-alueen ymparistolle.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Missy-kissa repii aidin ja tyttaren erilleen ja yrittaa viela tappaa perheen toisen kissan, Fluffyn. Jackson kiirehtii hatiin.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Bindi toivottaa pikkuruiset nuolimyrkkysammakot tervetulleiksi uuteen kotiinsa elaintarhaan. Terri ottaa ohjat kasiinsa, kun Boscoa muutetaan ulos Crocoseumista.

programme.title: Project Grizzly
programme.desc: Dokumenttisarja. Jeff on hyvillaan, kun Bob ja Screech oppivat ruokkimaan itse itsensa. Han opettaa elaimia rakentamaan talvimajan. Harmaakarhut vahtivat reviiriaan.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tutin nielaissut kultainennoutaja kiidatetaan leikkaukseen. Tri Jeff ryhmineen yrittavat pelastaa kulkukoiraa, joka on joutunut autokolariin Oklahomassa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: New Yorkin Pianoworks-liike tilaa pianonmuotoisen akryyliakvaarion. Loytyyko rakennuspuuhissa oikea nuotti?

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat tutkivat vesisuksionnettomuutta, jonka uhri joutui sairaalaan. Lewisville-jarvella riistanvalvojat tapaavat liikaa juoneen juhlijan.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Tri Dee lentaa Alaskan etaiseen Rubyn kylaan hoitamaan leikkaus- ja kastraatio-operaatioita itsepalvelupesulassa, minka jalkeen han auttaa vasikan hankalassa synnytyksessa.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete lahtee puumaja-lomalle Skandinavian havumetsiin. Matka alkaa Norjan maagisesta TreeTop-hotellista ja jatkuu viela Ruotsin puolelle.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson tyoskentelee aidin ja tyttaren kanssa, joiden kissakaksikko kay keskenaan aluetaistelua. Hairikko-kissa Bowie saa Jacksonin kanssa viimeisen tilaisuuden korjata tapansa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Bindi toivottaa pikkuruiset nuolimyrkkysammakot tervetulleiksi uuteen kotiinsa elaintarhaan. Terri ottaa ohjat kasiinsa, kun Boscoa muutetaan ulos Crocoseumista.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Tutin nielaissut kultainennoutaja kiidatetaan leikkaukseen. Tri Jeff ryhmineen yrittavat pelastaa kulkukoiraa, joka on joutunut autokolariin Oklahomassa.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi parta-agamaa asustavat makuuhuoneessa akvaariossa. Antonio rakentaa niille liskojen kerhotalon, joihin sisaltyy oma nurkka perhetta varten.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat julkisten palveluiden ulkopuolella ja selviavat yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat tutkivat vesisuksionnettomuutta, jonka uhri joutui sairaalaan. Lewisville-jarvella riistanvalvojat tapaavat liikaa juoneen juhlijan.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Asiantuntijat analysoivat uusia todisteita, jotka voisivat osoittaa, etta Bray Roadin petoon terrorisoinut kaupunkia Wisconsinissa. Ja leviaako ihmis-susi-hybridi Yhdysvalloissa?

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete matkustaa Oregoniin toteuttamaan 81-vuotiaan Marlenen ikuisen haaveen eli luksustason puumajan.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: New Yorkin Pianoworks-liike tilaa pianonmuotoisen akryyliakvaarion. Loytyyko rakennuspuuhissa oikea nuotti?

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 5. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 6. Houston toivottaa tervetulleiksi elainlaakarit Bluen, Rossin ja Lavignen, joilla on kadet taynna toita aina riskialttiista leikkauksista sairaiden kameleonttien diagnosointiin. (The Vet Life, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 3. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Jackson kouluttaa bengalinkissa Sydneyta, joka merkitsee kaikki huonekalut pissaamalla. Energinen Stella-kissa uhkaa vahingoittaa taaperoa.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10 osa 12/21. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls And Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos keraa varoja pelastuskeskukselle jarjestamalla Halloween-juhlat. Vanha ystava palaa takaisin, ja Lizzy joutuu vaikeaan irtokoiran pelastustehtavaan keskella yota.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Hiljattain kuolleen Villalobosin tyontekija Muttin perhe tapaa koiran, jonka mies oli valinnut heille. Tia ja M2 jahtaavat villihanhia lahella koulurakennusta.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan elainlaakari Dee Thornellin elamaa Alaskan rajaseudulla. Hanen monenkarvaiseen asiakaskuntaansa kuuluu elaimia rekikoirista poroihin ja lemmikkikarhuihin, ja Dee saa henkilokuntineen hoidettavakseen aaritapauksen jos toisenkin. Tarvittaessa apuun riennetaan tiettomien taipaleiden taa niin lentokoneella, moottorikelkalla kuin koirienkin vetamana. Alkaa uusintana.

programme.title: Dr. Dee: Alaska Vet
programme.desc: Laakari Dee tutkii kaksi hevosta: isolla saattaa olla hengenvaarallinen ongelma ja pienella on arhakka asenne. Han myos nayttaa uudelle sikatilalliselle, miten possuja kastroidaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Henkilokuntaa huolestuttaa, kun rakastettu afrikkalalinen pingviini sairastuu mysteerisesti. Akvaariossa saadaan todistaa uhanalaisen lajin vuosittaista kutemista.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Realitysarja. Jackson auttaa yksihuoltajaaitia, jonka Pickles-kissa pelottelee taman lapsia. Lucifer-kissan pirullinen pakkomielle ruokaan saattaa vieda sen hengen.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perhe elaa ahtaassa kodissa pelastamiensa elainten kanssa. Elaimiin kuuluu mm. kaksi minihevosta, jotka nukkuvat vanhempien makuuhuoneessa! Antonio rakentaa niille tallin.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Kausi 1, osa 27. Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin. (How Do Animals Do That?, dokumentti, USA, 2019)

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Elaimet tekevat uskomattomia asioita, mutta oletko koskaan pohtinut miten tai miksi? Sarjassa vastatataan kiehtovimpiin elainaiheisiin kysymyksiin.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Seuraa jattilaispanda Mao Maon raskautta aina dramaattiseen peratilasynnytykseen. Wolongin suojelu- ja tutkimuskeskus yrittaa elvyttaa vastasyntynytta.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Donut Mania on Brettin uusin liikeidea ja nyt vietetaan sen isoja avajaisia. Wayde ja tiimi onnittelevat uutta yritysta yllatysakvaariolla.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Alaska Monsters
programme.desc: Alaskan kolmiona tunnetulta alueelta etsitaan siella huhujen mukaan piileskelevia mystisia luontokappaleita.

programme.title: Return to Shark Island
programme.desc: Reunionin saaren haiden kohtaamiset ovat lisaantyva ongelma ja siksi paikalliset pelkaavat veteen menemista. Haitutkijat tutkivat meneillaan olevaa haikriisia loytaakseen haille ja ihmisille tavan elaa sovussa.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Teksasin riistanvalvojat taistelevat rikoksia vastaan ja suojelevat osavaltion luonnonvaroja. Valvojat loytavat rajajoelta laittomia verkkoja huumekuriireja etsiessaan.

programme.title: Hubble: The Wonders of Space Revealed
programme.desc: To celebrate the 30th anniversary of its launch, this film tells the remarkable story of how Hubble revealed the awe and wonder of our universe and how a team of daring astronauts risked their lives to keep it working.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels east through the Balkans along the most exotic section of the Orient Express. His destination is Istanbul, a multi-ethnic city where Europe and Asia meet via an underground railway. 1/6

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Comedians Maisie Adam and Suzi Ruffell wouldnt call themselves road aficionados - it took 10 goes to pass their driving tests between them - but theyre tackling Morocco anyway.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of the 7,000 remote tropical islands in the Philippines to live with `Jungle Neil Hoag, a 45-year-old former cabbie from Florida who struggled to make a living before finding the love of his life on the other side of the world.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Trees
programme.desc: We discover how trees can extend their lives by `walking across the land and planting new roots, how they can `learn from trauma, and how a decaying tree has the miraculous ability to nurture new life.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Yesterday HD12:00 PM to 1:00 PMFriday 5 JanuaryShareAdd to Calendar+Linz to BratislavaSeason 7 Episode 5 of 10SSubtitlesMichael Portillo travels by train through Austria and the Czech Republic, beginning in the northern Austrian city of Linz, where Adolf Hitler lived as a young boy. From here, Michael travels onto Prague Central Station, where he meets 87-year-old Zuzana Maresova, who, as a seven-year-old girl climbed aboard a train to travel to safety in London with hundreds of other Jewish children. Eventually crossing the Czech border into Slovakia, Michael reaches his final destination, one of Europes youngest capital cities, BratislavaGreat Continental Railway Journeys airs on Yesterday HD at 12:00 PM, Friday 5 January. (Subtitles.)TopicsLeisure hobbiesTourism ➝ TravelMichael PortilloPresenterAlison KrepsSeries EditorJohn ComerfordExecutive ProducerCassie FarrellDirector

programme.title: Hubble: The Wonders of Space Revealed
programme.desc: To celebrate the 30th anniversary of its launch, this film tells the remarkable story of how Hubble revealed the awe and wonder of our universe and how a team of daring astronauts risked their lives to keep it working.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve travels to South Africa where he explores the plight of the rhino. Sought after for their horns, these animals are on the verge of being poached to extinction. 1/11

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Vienna, Michael Portillo encounters a pre-Cold War spy and learns about the concert that caused a riot in 1913. He then travels the Habsburg imperial line across the Semmering Pass, a line blasted through the Alps. In Graz, the former politician ventures underground at the Lurgrotte Caves to find out about a famous rescue operation of the past, then in Slovenia discovers how an earthquake in Ljubljana prompted its citizens to assert their national identity in architecture and art. Arriving in the Italian port of Trieste, Michael savours the imported coffee that fuelled a cafe culture.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben journeys to one of Britains furthest outposts, the Shetland Islands, to meet Helen and Jason - a couple just a few years into their new life on the edge of the weather-beaten island of Yell.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben is closer to home than hes ever been in rural Oxfordshire where he spends the week with a multi-generational family, who surrendered their conventional life.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With spring in full effect across the Arctic, residents of Alaska must seize seasonal opportunities. Sue Aikens sets out to hunt small game but must be wary of her recent surgery.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: An in-depth analysis of a massive volcanic eruption in 44 BC may have hastened the end of the ancient Egyptian empire.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey shed light on how some of Britains biggest factories make the nations favourite products, beginning with popular breakfast cereals. Gregg starts by receiving a boat-load of corn fresh from Argentina, and witnesses as it is cooked, milled and flavoured to become a top-selling cereal brand. Cherry learns about the immunity-boosting powers of vitamin D, which is added to many of the UKs most popular cereals, and historian Ruth Gordon samples a Victorian breakfast of lobster and pigs head, as part of a daily meal that included 4,500 calories

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Life in some of the many deserts and grasslands around the world, including in the baked Namib desert, where a pair of ostriches raise their family in the searing heat to keep them safe from predators. One troop of desert baboons are on a continual quest to find water and a young mother who is low in the pecking order must battle for her right to drink. Closer to the equator, in the grassland paradise of the Cerrado in Brazil, lives the rare, fruit-eating maned wolf, a bizarre creature about whom little is known

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo makes a grand tour of a favourite Edwardian destination - Italy - where he experiences first-hand the nations need for speed in a state-of-the-art Maserati sports car. Michael ends his journey in futuristic style with a high-speed boat trip across Lake Garda. 3/6

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: With the waterways open, Alaskans navigate the rivers for reconnaissance and resources. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker must endure a grueling process of launching their boats for a critical hunt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Explorer Ben Fogle meets more people whove turned their back on the rat race and set up home in some of the most remote and inhospitable parts of the world. In this series, Ben meets Alex, a retail whizz-kid who left the UK for his own remote Portuguese mountain. He joins Georg and Bettina, a European couple whove found solace in the Irish wilderness. And Ben visits Sandy, whos swapped a career in the tourist industry to rescue animals on a Greek Island. He also meets Helen and Jason, tackling life in the Shetlands, the most northerly point in the UK. And in the US, Ben travels the deserts of Arizona with Dee, a modern-day nomad living life out of her van.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The discovery of an executed man in Northern Italy reveals the truth behind the Roman practice of crucifixion. 6/6

programme.title: Paddy and Chris: Road Tripping
programme.desc: Paddy and Chris head to Switzerland to explore its multi-million-pound wellness industry. The lads travel to one of the countrys top wellness resorts for a full body MOT to assess how well theyre ageing. After a consultation with specialists, theyre put through a rigorous training programme that reveals their true biological ages, surprising them both. Paddy, also eager to address his thinning hair, travels to Zurich to a men-only clinic to explore available treatments.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert and friend and fellow comedian Angela Barnes cross Italys most treacherous Alpine roads in Rhods first adventure since being treated for cancer.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle meets an ex-fighter pilot turned hill farmer, Steve Lall. Steve turned his back on Indian high society for a simple farmers life in the mountains.

programme.title: Worlds Most Dangerous Roads: The Extra Mile
programme.desc: Rhod Gilbert presents a selection of some of the funniest and most dramatic moments from the series.

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: Robson Green walks in the footsteps of the brave soldiers of the D-Day landings in Normandy, France, on an emotional journey of sacrifice and courage. 4/8

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: See the long, dark, frozen winters to sweltering, bug-infested summers in remote Canada.

Arriving in the Italian port of Trieste, Michael savours the imported coffee that fuelled a cafe culture.

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve travels to South Africa where he explores the plight of the rhino. Sought after for their horns, these animals are on the verge of being poached to extinction. 1/11

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to a remote island in Australias Great Barrier Reef to live with former Sydney businessman David Glasheen. Since losing a fortune in the 1987 stock market crash, which also cost him his marriage, David has led a Robinson Crusoe-like existence. Ben learns how to pick oysters, brew beer, trade fish and dance with the locals, finding out how it feels to truly live alone.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels north to Alaska to live with Bretwood Higman, Erin McCittrick and their two children. Bretwood and Erin hiked 4,000 miles to get here, and the family now lives for half the year in a Mongolian-style yurt on the mountainside, with the other half spent hiking in the wilderness. While staying with them, Ben learns how to chop trees and protect himself from grizzly bears.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to New Zealand, where he meets the Long family, who live as hunter-gatherers in the Gorge River area of National Park. He helps dad Robert to hunt for rock lobsters and catch eels, while mum Catherine must climb a sheer waterfall to check for storm damage to the familys gravity-fed water pipe.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Ricko DeWilde travels to cursed lands to finally lay his brothers spirit to rest. Sue Aikens ventures into the tundra to map the shifting landscape. 4/16

programme.title: Robson Green: Worlds Most Amazing Walks
programme.desc: The presenter hikes the Great Glen Way in Scotland, a rift valley that cuts through the Highlands from the foot of Ben Nevis to Loch Ness

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg visits Europes largest biscuit factory in London where they produce 80 million biscuits every day. Following the production of chocolate digestives, he discovers that the biscuits are shaped by a bronze roller and that the chocolate is actually added to the bottom of the biscuits.

programme.title: Treasures Decoded
programme.desc: The stunning discovery of an executed man in Northern Italy reveals the brutal truth behind the Roman practice of crucifixion and sheds new light on the most famous crucifixion of all. 1/6

programme.title: North Atlantic: The Dark Ocean
programme.desc: Underwater cameraman Ken OSullivan travels along the south coast of Ireland searching for fin whales, finding out that their migration routes have only recently started to be documented.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue Aikens must protect Kavik from the dangers that lurk in the shadows. The Hailstones use the cover of night to search for food under the ice.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to Dorset to live for a week with Chris, a former paratrooper who has spent the last five years walking Britains coastline, finding love and raising thousands for charity.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Starting 1 mile above sea level in Colorados state capital Denver, cameras follow the famous Rocky Mountaineer train as it makes its way through dramatic scenery in the state of Utah.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Paddy McGuinness visits a factory that makes 4 million individual Belgian chocolates every day. Ruth discovers the origin of St Nicholas and later visits a chocolate museum.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As winter comes to an end, Alaskans journey, hunt, and prepare for spring.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben travels to the canyons of Utah to meet 72-year-old twins Bill and Bob Stone, who fled their adrenaline-junkie pasts for a tough subsistence lifestyle as they also deal with the challenges associated with growing old. He joins the brothers as they go cattle-wrangling, rock climbing and skydiving, while Ben also discovers more about them and why they decided to cut themselves off from civilisation. Once parachute instructors, police informants and bounty hunters, they are now organic farmers who are preparing for doomsday.

programme.title: The Great Intelligence Test
programme.desc: The Great British Intelligence Test measures the brainpower of the nation in one of the largest intelligence experiments of its kind.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: Joanna is heading to a collection of remote Indonesian islands so small that her first challenge is finding them on the map - the Banda Islands were once the only place on Earth where nutmeg grew.

programme.title: Tutankhamun with Dan Snow
programme.desc: Dan investigates why the faces on Tuts coffins and canopic jars look more like a woman, and archaeologist Raksha Dave examines a recently restored box used for the pharaohs clothes and discovers evidence to suggest it may actually have belonged to Nefertiti. Meanwhile, John Sergeant revisits his Strictly days as he learns how to dance like an Egyptian at a funeral.

programme.title: Suuri ompelukisa
programme.desc: Lamminhenkinen kisareality. Hyvantuulisessa ompelukisassa 10-12 harrastajaa ottaa haasteen vastaan ja neulan kateensa kilpaillakseen paremmuudesta. Kipailijoita testataan kaikessa ompeluun liittyvassa, materiaalien hallinnassa, ompelutekniikassa ja suunnittelussa. Jokaisessa jaksossa on kolme erilaista tehtavaa ja juontajana toimii koomikko Joe Lycett. Sarja on ollut suosittu Britanniassa ja se on koonnut television eteen seka innostuneet harrastajat etta asiaan perehtymattomat. (The Great British Sewing Bee, S5-7. Britannia, 2019-2021.)

Muunnostehtavassa huomiohaalareista on muokattava juhlavaatteita! Kolmanneksi taytyy tehda 80-luvun ikoninen cocktailmekko.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Leipurien on luotava henkilokohtaisena taidonnaytteena halkeileva marenki, tekninen haaste on horjuva, showstopper-numero on monimutkainen suklaaluomus, joka lupaa paljastaa kaiken.

programme.title: Life in Colour with David Attenborough
programme.desc: Luonto on taynna vareja, jotka antavat ihmisille kauneuden kokemuksen, mutta elaimille ne ovat selviytymiskeino. David Attenborough kertoo, miten huikeilla tavoilla elaimet kayttavat vareja.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Viimeisella huviretkellaan Travel Manina Richard Ayoade rientaa Dubrovnikiin komedian kolossin Stephen Merchantin kanssa. Kaksikko laskeutuu maailman parhaiten museoituun keskiajan kaupunkiin syoksyakseen fantasian kimppuun. Parivaljakko lahtee paljolti Dubrovikissa kuvatun Game of Thronesin kierrokselle, jossa tarkastelevat joitain sarjan ikonisimpia tapahtumapaikkoja ennen jatkamistaan kokeilemaan paikallisesti tuotettuja Ston-ostereita. Simpukat hoideltuaan he suuntaavat kukkuloille, ja kahden ja puolen tunnin ajan he saavat kuraa paalleen kuullessaan alueen modernista historiasta monkijan kyydissa. Heidan minilomansa kulminoituu hetkeen, joka ei ole kummankaan toivelistalla, kun he istuvat Game of Thronesin valtaistuimen muovisella kopiolla.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Koomikko Lou Sanders lahtee Richard Ayoaden mukaan kahden paivan pikakaynnille Bergeniin. He tutustuvat sita ymparoiviin vuoriin ja vuonoihin seka kokevat parasta, mita talla norjalaiskaupungilla on tarjota. Parivaljakko tutustuu Bryggenin lahioon ennen lahtoa koysiradalle Ulriken-vuoren huipulle, jossa he testaavat Norjan nopeinta vaijeriliukua. Sen jalkeen Richard ja Lou nousevat veneeseen gastronomista seikkailua varten, kun heidan oppaansa Marrian luotsaa heidat pikkusaarelle osittain itse keratylle aterialle, joka valmistetaan avotulella. Richardin ja Loun loma jatkuu nousulla toiselle vuorelle, kun he astuvat Fløibanenin funikulaariin, joka nousee Fløyen-vuoren laelle. Sielta he menevat puunistutuskierrokselle, tsekkaavat Tubakuban, ja vuohi kohtelee Louta kylmasti.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Koomikko Joe Wilkinson lahtee Richard Ayoaden mukaan kahden vuorokauden pikavierailulle historialliseen Krakovaan, joka on tunnettu kulttuuristaan, satumaisesta vanhasta kaupungistaan ja leivonnaisistaan. He santaavat paata pahkaa leipomoon leipomaan Krakovan suolaista nimikkovalipalaa ja bagelin edellakavijaa, obwarzanek krakowskia. Toisena paivana peloton kaksikko vyottaytyy Trabantin kyytiin kierrokselle Nowa Hutan kommunistialueella, ja lounas tulee pierogien muodossa – mykyina, jotka voidaan tayttaa monenlaisilla taytteilla – ja mita seuraa lisaa pierogeja jalkiruoaksi. Parivaljakko hankkiutuu eroon hiilareista lasimaalauspajassa, ja mittatilausmatkamuistot rakkaudella juotettuina Richard ja Joe matkaavat muinaiselle kummulle pohtimaan hauskuutta Krakovassa.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 tuntia ...
programme.desc: Koomikko Ellie Taylor lahtee Richard Ayoaden mukaan kahden paivan mutkittelulle ympari Madridia seuraten paljon taidetta, kinkkua, historiaa ja huomionkipeytta sisaltavaa matkasuunnitelmaa. Kinkku puuttuu harvoin ruokalistalta Espanjassa, ja Richard ja Ellie osallistuvat kinkunvuolemistyopajaan, jota seuraa viiden ruokalajin maistelumenyy. Toisena paivana Madridissa he tsekkaavat kaupungin laajimman puiston ja istuvat ankkakirkkoon, jossa klovni ja entinen sirkustaiteilija Leo Bassi pitaa palveluksen sunnuntaina. Virkistavan vermuttijuomauhrin jalkeen he tekevat kierroksen kaupungilla kuullakseen tarinan Espanjan inkvisitiosta ennen kuin arvioivat Madridin ansioita.

programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin (SCOTT MENVILLE), Starfire (HYNDEN WALCH), Cyborg (KHARY PAYTON), Beast Boy (GREG CIPES) and Raven (TARA STRONG) continue the fun in season six of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero … once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy — based upon DC characters — focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure — these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out. In the season seven premiere, Robin dreams of receiving a #1 Dad mug, so Raven magically turns them into a sitcom family.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a friends tree mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. So Lilit lights up and stands in its place for the night... and soon gets quite bored! Lilits good deed has her regretting her gift - shes basically just a lamp! But when her light goes out, Lilit instantly regrets regretting it: she wants her gift back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was. But Chep promises that this time he wont. And Lilit, who is too honest to keep a secret, promises she wont let Chep know what the surprise is. Both of them find this so hard! But Mush-Mush is one step ahead of them...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. While looking for a backup zapper, they happen onto a top secret Canadian Army prototype that enables you to apply the usual controls: play, pause and fast forward to living beings.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at a farmers’ market with Irma at her knitwear stall – right next to a man selling novelty teapots. Bean is instantly smitten with a green car-shaped one but can’t afford it. When he visits a food truck that’s laid out free samples, he hatches a plan to swipe them and sell them on his own stall so he can raise the cash for the teapot of his dreams!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is watching Clint Chiseljaw - his favourite action TV show - with Billy, but Mrs Wicket orders her nephew downstairs to finish his chores. Inspired by Clint’s catchphrase – “Nobody gets left behind”, Mr Bean tries a variety of different daring plans to break Billy out of Mrs Wicket’s flat. But none of them work, until he hits on the perfect plan… or so he thinks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean peers through the window of the opening party of an art exhibition and sees free snacks being handed around – yum! But he’s told by the bouncer that he needs to be smartly dressed. So he sneaks into the artist’s studio and paints a tuxedo onto himself. This time he’s let in, but will Bean’s fake painted suit last long enough for him to get his free food?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to watch the motor racing on TV, when Mrs Wicket interrupts him to offer a deal – revamp her garden with new paving and ornaments, and he’ll get a month’s rent for free. Bean reluctantly agrees, but when he sees Mr Paliwal finish a personal training session and keen for more, he offers him a new workout… doing all Mr Bean’s work for him while he watches the racing! Win, win!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is bored of queuing for a trampoline park, so secretly bounces in through a window using a trampette. But he soon gets on the wrong side of a young show-off boy who keeps stealing Teddy and throwing him in hard-to-reach spots. To settle their row, they agree on a race around the trampoline park – first place wins Teddy. Will Mr Bean triumph before he’s chucked out for jumping the queue?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is struggling to sell items from her knitwear stall at the market, so sends Mr Bean to collect a sheep costume he can wear to attract customers. Once at the fancy dress shop however, Mr Bean gets stuck in the sheep costume and has to travel back to the market wearing it. Things go from bad to worse when Mr Bean takes a short cut across the field and gets caught up in a flock of real sheep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush wants to be just like Starmush when he grows up, because he’s convinced that Starmush is the most awesome Mushable there is and that his daily life must be extraordinary. So, Mush-Mush trails Starmush, which soon annoys the Mushelder. To get rid of Mush-Mush, Starmush decides to live up to the Mushler’s fantasies…

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry fancies himself an artist, but Tom disagrees. Their artistic antics blur lines between art and chaos. Other than a trail of mess, what else will they leave behind?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Bean’s bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang enter Dickens classic ?A Christmas Carol?, as they try to get to the bottom of the mysterious ghost tormenting Scrooge in 1843 England. Unfortunately, the Ghosts begin to convince Velma shes on a disastrous path of her own.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Unhappy about a mystery-free, three-day, cross-country train trip with the gang, Fred is pleasantly surprised to discover a monster mystery on board. Hes less pleasantly surprised however, when that mystery is interrupted by a second mystery, then a third, then a fourth…

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from stealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Yosemite Sam to build a dude ranch. Sam hurries the crew along, negatively impacting their work.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes to the beach to get a tan, but when the countryman arrives and prevents him from exposing to the sun, he is trying to find another place. And when the nimbus cloud covers the sun, he starts to desperately chase the beam of sunlight across London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes the Lab and the unenviable task of orange-blob-retrieval falls to Specs and Skinny. The Boss equips them with increasingly expensive vehicles. The real issue might be staffing.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a small bump. Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the Ranger Lemming toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder, then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside, until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a re-match.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is disturbed during his nap by flies buzzing incessantly around his head. When he realizes that the carnivorous plant upon which the Lemmings are playing rodeo feeds off flying insects, he decides to confiscate it and use it as an anti-fly weapon.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snowcrawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a bad guy so Buff sets out to change their minds.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred wisselt van plek met Jeff, de tourgids in het geschiedenismuseum, zodat hij de gang kan helpen een mysterie op te lossen. Het mysterie: een angstaanjagende Egyptische krokodilgod terroriseert het museum. Het probleem: Fred is onmiddellijk jaloers op de nieuwe vent en wil het mysterie oplossen voordat Jeff de kans krijgt, met de hulp van de kinderen uit de tourgroep van Jeff.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De favoriete chef van Shaggy en Scooby opent eindelijk zijn eigen restaurant maar een monsterlijke yeti bedreigt de openingsavond. De gang moet het mysterie oplossen voordat het dessert wordt opgediend, terwijl Shaggy en Scooby de verleiding moeten weerstaan om al het eten op te eten dat voor de klanten bedoeld is!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. When Grizzy accidentally jumps in, he quickly gets caught up in the game and the clapometer goes wild! Intoxicated by his victory, the bear is by no means a modest winner! But the Lemmings want their moment of glory in the limelight as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerrys mouse hole, but the video goes viral, and Tom becomes a laughing stock.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. Its up to the duo to see whats really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock and a piranha they won in the ball toss.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the heat, Tom and Jerry use magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted wonderland with an evil snowman.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals. programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of.

programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple.
