Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing beach party inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: It’s the middle of the night and Tom plays makeshift instruments creating loud music that wakes up Jerry. Jerry tries to put an end to Toms concert with no success. Tuffy wakes up and goes along with the music. Jerry decides to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Just like every year for Halloween Fred refuses to leave the house. He believes that no mysteries will be solved on that day and that nothing will go as planned.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: On a trip to Japan to visit Velmas friend, the gang comes face to face with the ancient crab monster, Kaniaku, and attempts to solve a 700 year-old mystery. Meanwhile, Daphne accidentally becomes a viral media sensation in Japan!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: While on vacation, The Looney Builders befriend Coco the Crab and offer to build her a mini-resort. They shrink down for a micro-build and must rely on the islands natural resources to get the job done.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid won’t shut as it’s too full of rubbish – and by the time he’s shut it, they’ve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they won’t notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean… who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. He’s so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guy’s hip to all of Lamput’s tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny crashes Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs come up with a new gadget, giving them the ability to take on the animal’s strength to take Lamput down!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Woken with a start by a nightmare filled with Lemmings, Grizzy stumbles on the Rangers dream machine. Its a headphone set where you can program the theme of your choice before falling asleep within seconds for a night filled with sweet dreams. But who could possibly sleep soundly surrounded by Lemmings who want their fair share too?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto an old American India medallion bearing the symbol of the wind. He who wears it has the power to command air streams. Grizzy would be quite content to never leave the sofa again and control things from a distance, but the Lemmings want it to create fantastic new games that literally blow you away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. It soars off, leaving a rainbow-colored streak in its wake. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for his beloved she-bear, while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo on a bucking unicorn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are joined by Nibbles Mouse, aka Tuffy, as they ring in a wild wintertime celebration. Jerry and Tuffy are living the good life in Santas workshop until the day Tom is rescued by the Claus family! With Tom in the house, theres nothing but merry mayhem at the North Pole. But when the dust settles, can the comically destructive duo work together to save Christmas and learn the true meaning of friendship?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom visits a haunted castle where a lovely gardener raises monster plants.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie tells Tom that he wont have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra terrestrial life but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary Alien Monster.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the Gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick buys a drone that Tom and Jerry immediately put to use for their own high-jinks.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Manors prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfreds successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Toms efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The Lady of the Houses cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesnt catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is watching a hypnotist on TV, when the words you are asleep hit him hard. He becomes a virtual rag doll and ends up in a jumble of junk for Rick and Gingers yard sale. A woman who thinks hes a stuffed animal buys him. Jerry feels bad and hops aboard the car to rescue Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a free sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesnt notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that hes landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A quick shop turns chaotic as Mr. Bean battles a mile-long list and a wonky trolley, turning a simple errand into a full-blown comedy of errors.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Set to his rocking theme song, Bam the Batmobile takes to the streets of Gotham and uses his smarts, leadership skills and awesome gadgets to fight crime and stop the villainous Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a festive course for the Fall foot race. Wile E. Coyote is determined to beat the Road Runner with his Robo-Runner despite its malfunctions.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies – which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride – but the security guard makes it clear it’s for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, it’s not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He can’t afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean races his neighbor to grow a giant marrow, chasing prize money and a photo in the papers—but chaos and comedy ensue along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s heart-throb Roxy is singing at the Palladium. With her record, poster, and T-shirt ready, he’s determined to get her autograph no matter what.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car his favorite she-bear would be

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortune teller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing beach party inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A strange object is delivered to the Rangers cabin: an over-board! Its a latest generation skateboard which levitates above the ground without wheels.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: it’s been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs a nice nap. He cant find a pillow comfortable enough to his taste until he tests the pillow that the Lemmings use as a high-jump mat. The pillow is so soft that Grizzy falls asleep the second he lays his head on it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Daffy invites the crew to take a mud soak in his truck bed, and it turns out to be anything but relaxing.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunia’s Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just can’t put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bam’s utility belt for a mission. / Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham. / Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Bean’s bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Starmushs back is stuck, and the Mushelder has no choice but to ask for help in Mushton. Because Chep is the one that finds a solution to his back problem, Starmush chooses him to help with his daily activities. But Mush-Mush is jealous, he would have loved being the chosen one...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is so good at moss-marbles, no one wants to play him anymore! No one except Sumush who reveals himself to be a tough competitor. To Chep’s disbelief, Sumush keeps on winning. But Lilit and Mush-Mush convince their friend not to give up. Chep decides to play his favourite moss-marble: the Rollinator. The one marble he never risked playing before...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chanterelle sees how good Lilit is at painting, she offers to help her dig into her talent.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is very excited: tonight, a rare and extremely stinky plant is going to bloom! But he already promised Mush-Mush to play their favourite game. When he chooses the flower instead, Mush-Mush is angry and the two friends stop talking. But when Mush-Mush realises that Chep is about to miss the blooming, he decides he won’t let that happen and helps his friend!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit take their compost meals back to their home-tree to eat, they think they have made a great new discovery.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are playing dares and having a lot fun. All the Mushables are happy for them except Fung and Miff who keep mocking them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwal’s new drone that he doesn’t notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwal’s car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thief’s warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation – but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwal’s flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints – pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but it’s too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: Despite poor road infrastructure, massive traffic congestion, water transportation across the abundant waterways of Lagos, Nigeria is still underutilized. Now, renewed push to develop the regions waterways has seen a growth in passenger ferrires as well as a partnership with the international boat racing franchise E1. E1 is also looking to grow their presence on the continent through digital education and outreach. We take a look at the challenges and opportunities of tapping into the regions blue economy; Aspen Global CEO Samer Kassem sits down to discuss the biopharmaceutical giants growth and why he believes its Africas time to shine on a global stage when it comes to business.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Bingo saa vuorollaan paivakodin Bob-pussikaniininuken kotiinsa leikkimaan. Tarkoitus on myos merkita muistikirjaan kaikki, mita on tehty, joten Bingo haluaa, etta viikonlopusta tulee ikimuistoinen. Kun Bluey ja Bingo nayttavat kaiken paivaa Bobille piirrettyja ja videoita tabletilla, nayttaa silta, ettei Bob juuri nauti olostaan. Bingo syyttaa itseaan ja pahoittaa mielensa. Bluey tajuaa, etta jos perhe tekee hauskoja ja jannia asioita, silloin myos Bob viihtyy. Kaikki panevat alylaitteensa pois ja lahtevat yhdessa ulos nayttamaan Bobille, millaista on oikea hauskanpito!

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: On vuoden pisin paiva, ja Finias ja Ferb ottavat siita kaiken irti ja matkustavat maailman ympari yhdessa paivassa. Karaytys vai Jeremy? Han paattaa lahtea poikien mukaan todistaakseen, etta Jeremy yha pitaa hanesta. programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Anna Pihl sõdurirannakul
programme.desc: Ajakirjanik Anna Pihl võttis ette 24-tunnise katsumuse ja laks koos merevae kutsealustega sõdurirannakule. Kuidas ta pea 50-kilomeetrisel matkal vastu pidas ja millistele jareldustele jõudis? Autor Anna Pihl, režissoor Tarvo Molder, produtsent Mai Kangro.

programme.title: Nad muutsid Eestit
programme.desc: Neile pakuti tood kabinetivaikuses või tagalas, kuid nemad nõudsid meestega võrdset kohta lahingus. See on lugu sellest, kuidas Eesti sõjavaenaised on pidanud võitlema suhtumisega, et naiste koht ei ole eesliinil.

programme.title: OP lood
programme.desc: Filmides on palju helisid, mis on nii loomulikud, et neid esmapilgul tahele ei panegi - naiteks sammud või natsu narimine või võitlusstseeni loogid. Tegelikult ei sunni sellised heliefektid sageli sugugi mitte võtteplatsil, vaid nende helide jaoks on olemas foleykunstnik. Seda, kuidas neid efekte tehakse, naitas meile Eesti ainuke just foleydele puhendunud helikunstnik Anna-Maria Jams.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Candela tunnistab Píale tõtt. Leonor ja Martina lepivad ara. Abel tahab Jeronimo toa labi otsida. La Promesasse saabub ootamatu kulaline.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Linnugripiepideemia toob haiglas kaasa eriolukorra, arstid ja õed on vasinud ning tudinud. Jari avastab, et tal on ootamatult palju vaba aega, sest plaanilised operatsioonid jaavad ara. Suhetes pettunud Leevi otsustab end taielikult toosse matta.

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Film leiab aset 1959. aasta suvel Sidneys. See on lugu aarelinnas kasvanud noore koolitudruku elust, kes unistab eksamite tulemusi oodates Sidney ulikooli minemisest. Enne ulikooli minekut otsustab noor tudruk vastu võtta suvetoo suures kaupluses. Ta asub toole naiste keskele, kes õpetavad talle nii mõndagi elu kohta ning suunavad tudruku taielikule uuestisunnile.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike uurib seoseid surnud farmitoolise ja loomade salaparaste surmajuhtumite vahel. Tricia elab ule oma valesti pandud diagnoosi. David ja Blaketon on proua Beresfordi saatjad vanurite valjasõidul randa.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Jurka ja Ahven saavad teada, et Ruudi on eeluurimisvanglast põgenenud ning otsustavad ta ise kinni nabida. Raimile saabub Aimelt pakk. Raim raagib Marele oma minevikust. Georg saab teada, et tegelikult on ahvarduste taga Claire. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: EMOsse tuuakse elektriallergikust Saila, kes keeldub kategooriliselt rontgenisse minemast. Marjut laskub oma elevandiluutornist alla „lihtrahva“ sekka, kuid jaab oma alluvate naerualuseks. Maxi ja Jannica suhe jatkub.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Teresa ja Feliciano kihluvad. Manuel kaalub sõjavakke minekut. Leonor lahkub La Promesast huvasti jatmata. Jeronimo keeldub kella kohta selgitusi jagamast.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: 18. sajandil tehti imelisi avastusi - muuhulga leiutati giljotiin, aurumasin ja mulliga vesi. Algas toostusrevolutsioon ja hakkas kaduma parisorjus. Priit ja Mart Piusile on kultuuri uurimisel seekord abiks Roosmarii Kurvits, Fred Puss, Oliver Orro, Indrek Tarand ja paljud teised. Isegi kunnihobune! Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ja kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Spordiuudised

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby ja Winter lahevad uurima aardeotsija uppumissurma ning satuvad rivaalitsevate aardekuttide võitlustandrile. Samal ajal saabub tuntud naitlejanna alevikku otsima oma 40 aastat tagasi kaduma lainud tadi.

programme.title: Varvimuusika
programme.desc: Varvilisse võistlustulle astuvad legendaarne Terminaator ja uustulnuk Miljardid. Kreem versus Kuningas! Saadet juhib Ahven.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike uurib seoseid surnud farmitoolise ja loomade salaparaste surmajuhtumite vahel. Tricia elab ule oma valesti pandud diagnoosi. David ja Blaketon on proua Beresfordi saatjad vanurite valjasõidul randa.

programme.title: 55-mis siis!
programme.desc: Levi = lust ja hevi. Juubelisaate viimases osas annavad televaatajatele piki kõrvu kuumimad Eesti levimuusikud labi aegade.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Tanavu aasta kalaks valitud Euroopa angerjas on kriitiliselt ohustatud liik, ometi jatkatakse tema puugi ja tarbimisega nii meil kui ka mujal Euroopas. Tutvume lahemalt selle omaparase kalaga ja uurime, mida tuleks teha, et tal oleks tulevikku. Taastav põllumajandus kogub mitmel pool maailmas populaarsust, sest toetab lisaks jatkusuutlikule tootmisele ka umbritsevat keskkonda. Kulastame Inglismaal uhte farmi, kus on juba sadu aastaid jarjepidevalt talupidamisega tegeletud ja uurime, milliseid võtteid seal kasutatakse. Karl Adami jalgib sookiuru tegemisi. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Planeedipaastjad
programme.desc: Planeedi paastmise viimasel nadalal korraldame Mardile ja Taivole tõelise tuleneelamise praktikumi pealinna eksootilistes restoranides. Kallele pakume aga valja keskkonnasõbraliku liikumisviisi, mis paneb tal silmad sarama rohkem kui kunagi varem. Saatejuht Kadi Jaanisoo-Kuld, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Metslaste retke viimane paev. Liigume Lahemaal, kus meie teejuhiks on Martin, keda kutsutakse ka ilveselausujaks. Liigume ajas tagasi 30 aastat ja puhkame jalga uhes isearalises kauplus-baaris. Saame teada, mis on juhtunud meie kehadega parast sellist koormust ja vaatame kogetule tagasi. Lisaks uusi tarkusi loodusest ja kasulikke matkanippe. Sarja autor Lemo.

programme.title: Sõnakalender
programme.desc: Eesti Keele Instituudi Sõnakalender toob televaatajani uued sõnad, mis 2025. aastal leidsid tee Sõnaveebi EKI uhendsõnastikku. Iga paev tutvustavad uusi põnevaid sõnu ja nende tahendusi Helena Lotman ja Cristopher Rajaveer.

programme.title: Nõnda ka maa peal
programme.desc: Maria saabub ule aastate koos oma 5-aastase tutrega Inglismaalt Eestisse isa juurde jõulupeole. Isa on uksik vana jandrik, kes ei saa labi naabrite ega oma tutardega. Isa tõsise terviserikke tõttu peab Maria nuud kauemaks kodumaale jaama ja algab tragikoomiline teekond, mille kestel leitakse lepitus iseenda ning lahku kasvanud omastega. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissoor Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.

programme.title: Eesti imelised aastaajad
programme.desc: Eesti rahval on labi sajandite olnud igaks aastaajaks oma toimetused ja tegemised. Mõnda tood sobib ka moodsal ajal teha kõige paremini esivanemate jargi. Metsast puude saagimiseks passib ideaalselt kulmunud maaga talv. Vanarahva tõdesid ja loodushoiu põhimõtteid silmas pidades teeb oma kodumetsas kuttepuid Eesti Loodusmuuseumi zooloog ning teaduse populariseerija Lennart Lennuk.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Maria on vihane, et Henry kogu aeg Eveliniga suhtleb. Laine kardab, et Alma ei luba Haraldil teda kosida. Anneli kaib Margnalt raha kusimas. Iiris laheb Torimile kulla, aga leiab sealt hoopis Annemai.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommik randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just Maahommiku saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Autoportree
programme.desc: 1980. aastatel oli Eesti filmi kohta kaibel utlemine - Eesti film kaib Karguga. Peaaegu ukski valmiv mangufilm ei saanud labi ilma Tõnu Karguta. 1967. aastal tegi Kark oma esimese sutsu tehnikahuvilise noorukina Kaljo Kiisa filmis Keskpaevane praam, labimurdev filmiroll oli Olav Neulandi debuutlavastuses Tuulte pesa (1979). Tanaseks on neid filme, milles Tõnu Kargul on olnud kandev roll, rohkem kui 40. Lisaks osad mitme teise maa - nagu Venemaa, Soome ja Lati - filmides. Saates raagib Tõnu Kark oma filminaitlejatoost. Toimetaja Jaak Lõhmus, režissoor Ülle Õun, produtsent Silja Kala. 4. detsembril oli Tõnu Kargul 78. sunnipaev. Palju õnne!

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Pealtnagija on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni põnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaaže sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat, Margit Kilumets ja Uljana Kuzmina. Režissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Raamatuaasta puhul võõrustab kirjandusminister Mart Juur Eesti raamat 500 patrooni, president Alar Karist. Kord kuus raagime presidendi jaoks olulistest teostest. Tana kasitleme koos presidendi ja kulalistega 2025. aasta romaanivõistluse laureaadi Kaur Riismaa raamatut Vasinud valguse teooria.

programme.title: Hermakula. Kadunud isa
programme.desc: 1960-70ndad tõid nõukogude Eesti halli ja etableerunud kultuuripilti uue laine andekaid noori poeete ning kirjanikke, maalikunstnikke ja teatriuuendajaid. Kaes oli muutuste aeg ja tunda oli vaba mõtte sundi. Evald Hermakula alustas oma teatriteed noore, vihase geeniusena “Vanemuise” teatris, kus tõi lavale mitu siiani legendaarset lavastust. Ta oli teatriuuenduse peamine eestvedaja. Hermakula suund oli selge – eemale tekstist ja mõistusparasusest alateadvuse poole. Taispikk dokumentaalfilm raagib loo autori kasuisast Evald Hermakulast (1941-2000), karismaatilisest naitlejast, lavastajast ja vasimatust teatriuuendajast. Filmis segunevad lavastuslikud ja autori isiklikud malupildid dokumentaalse arhiivimaterjaliga ning Hermakula kaasaegsete mõtetega teatrist, elust ja surmast. Film uurib lavastaja ja kunstniku loomepsuhholoogiat ning selle totaalset mõju labi Hermakula traagilise elutee, mis lõppes vabasurmaga. Režissoor Maria Avdjushko, operaator Mait Maekivi, helilooja Sheripov, produtsent Pille Runk, tootjad Allfilm ja Ugri Film OÜ. 6. detsembril on Evald Hermakula 84. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Shetland
programme.desc: Shetlandilt parit neiu Ellen satub Londonis pealt nagema mõrva ja põgeneb oma kodusaarele. Teda saadetakse otsima uurija Ruth Calder, kes on ka Shetlandilt parit. Samuti jalitavad Ellenit kaks gangsterit ja Calder peab igal sammul otsa vaatama mineviku varjudele.

programme.title: Kuulsuse narrid
programme.desc: 1892. aastal valmis Eduard Bornhohel satiiriline teos Tallinna narrid ja narrikesed, kus ta kutsus ules joonistama mõningaid omaaegseis uhiskondlik-olustikulistes tingimustes veidruseni virildunud tuhiseid, haledaid ja naeruvaarseid inimtuupe, olgu nende narruseks siis kuulsus, raha või armastus. Kõige populaarsemaks sai teose esimene osa Kuulsuse narrid, kus pilkeobjektiks on kaks eesti vaimukangelast - kirjanik Salomon Vesipruul ja leiutaja Jaan Tatikas. Suureparased osataitmised uhelt meie labi aegade menukamalt naitlejate paarilt Urmas Kibuspuult ja Juri Krjukovilt. Lavastaja Ago-Endrik Kerge. Tana on Urmas Kibuspuu 70. sunniaastapaev.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: Sander kais loodusfotograaf Jarek Jõeperaga Kõrvemaa metsades, et saada nippe, kuidas loodust nutitelefoni kaameraga jaadvustada. Autor Sander Loite.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough tutvustab meile, kuidas imetajad suudavad oma organismid viia viimase piirini ja tanu sellele ellu jaada ka meie planeedi kõige palavamates paikades.

programme.title: 4x4. Island
programme.desc: Sarja teises osas kohtume saja aasta kõige kehvema Islandi suvega, kulastame esimest teele jaavat kohalikku eestlast, misjarel kiirustame olemasolevat matkavarustust taiendama. Leiame end kaevandusest ja ulituuliselt maetipult, vaatame mõistatuslikke kivitaieseid ning saame katte oma esimese kulma ja silmi avava tormioo. Režissoor Vaino Laisaar, tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Eesti mang
programme.desc: Sel nadalal panevad Eesti mangus oma teadmised proovile muusikud Evelin Samuel, Ollie ja Villemdrillem. Saadet juhib alati heatujuline Gaute Kivistik.

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Loomaaeda on saabunud kauaoodatud kaimanid ja salaparane stepivaraan. Esimene lumi toob endaga elevust, aga ka kurbust, sest janeste aedikusse on tunginud sisse metsloom. Kaes on loodusmaja ehituse viimane etapp, kuid avamispaev tundub veel magede taga olevat. Mirge raagib, kes loomadest kolivad kulma tulles siseruumidesse ja keda talv uldse ei heiduta. Loomaaednikud lahevad Pihtla Õllekooki uurima, kuidas valmivad nende uus limonaad ja kali. Risto vaatab tulevikku, sest valmis on saanud tema jarjekordne savikoda. Saaremaa Zoo osaleb Kuressaares jõululaadal. Saate tegijad Hannes Raimla ja Pilleli Laets, tootja Pilleli And Hannes / PH TEIK OÜ.

programme.title: Mehed, hakkame elama!
programme.desc: Kuus vaprat Eesti meest otsustasid end kaamerate ees tõsisemalt kasile võtta. Neljandas osas asub saatejuht ja diskor Erkki Sarapuu maadlema sellega, et endas võhma ja tugevamat fuusist kasvatada. Arsti visiit ullatas teda muidugi ka, misjarel pidime mehega tõsiselt raakima, kas on olemas ohutut alkoholi kogust. Saatejuht Kaidor Kaidor Kahar, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Teet Teder ja produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Valimised on Mornas labi ja Oliver-Sten võitis. Tema aga Maige utsitamisest hoolimata seda kohta ei taha ja tundub, et linnapeaks võib saada hoopis Margit. Tiik on lisaks kaotusele keeranud endale kokku kohutava jama koos sekretar Teresa ja Arega. Alma, Laine ja Harald arutavad e-haalte legitiimsust. Mare naitab Filipile skandaalseid pilte.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Sport. Sport
programme.desc: Sport. Sport

programme.title: Outrageous
programme.desc: Diana lahutab abielu ja riskib kõigega suhte parast Mosleyga. Unity liitub mustsarklastega. Ta kaib koos Dianaga Saksamaal Hitlerit kuulamas ja vaimustub fašismist uha rohkem. Nancy alustab lohutussuhet Peteriga.

programme.title: Ohjus
programme.desc: Niina satub toole kolkalehte Lapimaa Uudised. Samal ajal imbub valja informatsioon, et kõval kargatusel, mida ta oosel kuuleb, võib midagi pistmist olla NSV Liidu poolt Soome õhuruumi lennanud raketiga. Lapi linnake taitub erinevaid huvisid esindavate kodanikega ja varskel ajakirjanikul Niinal on võimalus hakata uurima ootamatult sulle sadanud pommuudist. Samal ajal aga areneb edasi kulm sõda kodurindel vagivaldse abikaasaga, kes soovib vanglast naastes Niinaga ara leppida. R: Miia Tervo. O: Oona Airola, Pyry Kahkonen, Hannu-Pekka Bjorkman, Tommi Korpela, Tiina Tauraite jt. Tana on Soome iseseisvuspaev.

programme.title: Disko ja tuumasõda
programme.desc: Jaak Kilmi ja Kiur Aarma manguline dokumentaalfilm lapsepõlvest Nõukogude Eestis, kulmast sõjast ning kuumadest ihadest. Disko ja tuumasõda raagib uhest veidrast infosõjast, kus totalitaristlik võim seisis vastamisi popkultuuri kangelastega. Ja kaotas. Selles olukorras oli võimalik, et Emmanuelle alistab Punaarmee ja Michael Knight terve kooli õppenõukogu, kaardistab filmi produtsent Kiur Aarma toonaste ideoloogiliste madinate lahinguvalja. Film meie põlvkonnast, kes enese teadmata oli toodud kulma sõja eesliinile. Meie ajusid pommitati laane telelainetega, mis muutis põhjalikult kogu me elu, utleb filmi reþissoor Jaak Kilmi. Toonaste laste maailmapildi kujunemisel etendas laane popkultuur uliolulist, ent nuudse pilgu jaoks veidrat rolli. Aknaks unistuste maailma oli Soome televisioon, mida võimukandjad ei suutnud kuidagi keelustada. Paralleelselt poliitilise trilleriga kulgevad filmis lavastatud lood, mis põhinevad tol ajal ules kasvanud laste malestustel. Need on absurdselt naljakad lood, sest lapsed olid taolises skisofreenilises olukorras, kus maailm, milles nad elasid, oli veidi totakas. Ja kõik ilusad ning põnevad asjad olid hoopis televiisoris peidus, utleb Kilmi. Film pakub oma kasitluse lahiajaloost, kus segunevad luuremangud ja inimlik tragikomoodia. Autorid Jaak Kilmi ja Kiur Aarma. Produtsent Kiur Aarma, kaasprodutsendid Aleksi Bardy ja Annika Sucksdorff. Tootjad Eetriuksus ja Helsinki Filmi.

programme.title: Hukkunud Alpinisti hotell
programme.desc: Vendade Strugatskite teose ainetel valminud teaduslik-fantastiline põnevusfilm inimeste kohtumisest tulnukatega teiselt planeedilt. Režissoor Grigori Kromanov, operaator Juri Sillart, kunstnik Tõnu Virve, helilooja Sven Grunberg. Osades Uldis Pucitis, Juri Jarvet, Lembit Peterson, Mikk Mikiver, Karlis Sebris, Irena Kriauzaite, Sulev Luik, Tiit Harm, Nijole Ozelyte, Kaarin Raid.

programme.title: Kova laki: Erikoisyksikko
programme.desc: Television pisimpaan jatkuneen draamasarjan, Kovan lain, luojalta ruutuun saapuu nyt vaikuttava sarja, joka kertoo New Yorkin poliisivoimien SVU-erityisyksikon elamasta ja tyosta. Kussakin jaksossa seuraamme rikosetsiva Elliot Stableria, Olivia Bensonia, John Munchia seka Odafin Tutuolaa, kun he yrittavat ratkaista kaupungin mutkikkaimpia rikoksia. He seuraavat kutakin johtolankaa, eivatka lepaa ennen kuin saavat oikeutta viattomille uhreille ja paljastavat totuuden.
